definition: to abolish/to abandon/to abrogate/to discard/to depose/to oust/crippled/abandoned/waste
copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]

sentences.english: When I grew a little bigger, I went out to collect the waste copper, iron, and broken glass to sell.
sentences.chinese: 再長大些，我就揀些廢銅爛鐵和碎玻璃什麼的去賣。

sentences.english: Scrap metal can Be recycled (turned) into "gold and silver".
sentences.chinese: 廢物利用，廢銅爛鐵可提煉出“金子”“銀子”。

sentences.english: And you're pinning the hopes of the entire mission on that relic?
sentences.chinese: 你們就把希望寄託在那堆廢銅爛鐵上？
